## Project Overview
Built a robot that could follow a light source in a dark environment with integrated collision protection, servo control, and a capacitive touch sensor that toggled different movement speeds. 

::: {style="text-align: center;"}
![Runtime Video](robot_video.mov){height="400px"}
:::

## Key aspects of the project

* **Circuit Design**: Created the hardware of the robot to be able to do several tasks
    * Object detection
    * Capacitive touch sensor
    * Light detection

<d><d>

* **Embedded Systems & Control Logic**: Programmed an Arduino in C++
    * Finite state machine to control actions
    * Variable creation and monitoring to inform the state machine
    * Modular programming technique which separated perception, planning, and action
